item.title: Revenge of the Flies
item.description: A SciFi short film in which a swarm of flies goes to a programmer house in search of revenge. This short film is made for the special effects course during my M.Sc. in Cinema and media engineering. I was involed in this project as VFX Artist and Particle animator. Technologies involved: Maya: Particles animation Bender: Flies modeling and animation AfterEffects: Compositing and camera matchmoving DaVinci Resolve: Editing and Color Grading Here’s the short: Crew:

item.title: About
item.description: Calabrian blood and cosmopolitan soul, I grow up with a consolidated technical training in university environment studying Information Engineering and Cinema and Media Engineering. There are, however, innumerable stimuli and inspirations of an artistic nature along the way, to the point that I decided to join these two souls by choosing to become a Technical Artist. What I do is therefore dedicate myself to the creation of tools that through digital technologies allow artists to best express their potential.
